item.title: new domains
item.author: me@robxu9.com (Robert Xu)
item.description:
So.

Over the past two months I have expanded my domain acquisitions. I now own rxu.io and rxu.tech, but I don’t exactly have too much of a clue with what to do with them. Yet.

I’m thinking that I’ll be making rxu.io my personal homepage site - some nice one page with links to all my profiles, resumes, this blog, etc; and rxu.tech a listing of projects that I am or were involved with.

But I am completely open to other ideas.
